name: Stabby Stabby
description:
Hey!

This is my first (working) game, so don't expect anything extravagant. The aim of the game is to kill as many of the enemies as you can. There are three different modes:

Controls:

A  - Left

D - Right

Left Click - Damage Enemies

Easy - Stupidly Easy, the enemies are slow and come just from the left.

Medium - The enemies are now coming from both sides.

Chaos - The enemies are going to come from the top, left and right. When sleighing the top enemies, face them and when they are above you they can be killed.
